subject: FIX for TC-675
commitMessage:
FIX for TC-675

Finish 4000 mp3 files basic attrs indexing within 20s.

Not parsing the bitrate and length when basic attrs indexing.
After basic attrs parsed, start two thread to parse bitrate
and length.

when basic attrs indexing, sometimes the indexing consume too
much cpu time, at this moment, also enable one thread to parse
bitrate and length.

And start a process stat file before real access the file,
shorten the indexing duration.

Change-Id: I26b2f690f3b17b4a96b5284f4e6cf6f48592ff47
Signed-off-by: chunqiangx <chunqiangx.tang@intel.com>

comments.message:
